泄出.definition: to leak out; to release (liquid or gas)

泄漏天機.definition: to divulge the will of heaven (idiom); to leak a secret; to let the cat out of the bag

泄露.definition: to leak (information); to divulge; also pr. [xie4lou4]

泄露天機.definition: to divulge the will of heaven (idiom); to leak a secret; to let the cat out of the bag
